attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: Horrible.  It was supposed to be a perfect app.  It is perfect.  Perfectly stupid.    It is very very terrible. People are saying it is a Democrat hoax and not a real app. Maybe it would be a good app if people stop using it.  I think the ratings will go up if people stop using it.

attributes.title: I want to talk to the manager
attributes.review: To my complete and utter disappointment, this app was very glitchy. It caused my phone to completely shut down several times. I can‚Äôt even begin to express how mad and disappointed I am. I will be calling the manager.

attributes.title: Didn‚Äôt fit!
attributes.review: This runs big so when u consider buying go a size down so it will fit better. It‚Äôs also see thru so very disfunctional in a public setting. Not high waisted either. Would recommend something else.

attributes.title: Disgusted
attributes.review: This app MADE ME SICK I cannot believe you decided to make me look at those things! Children  use these phones!! I thought this was about to be about our wonderful leader, but I am very disappointed. Would never recommend getting

attributes.title: Horrible!!
attributes.review: This app was suggested to me by a friend on tik tok. He claimed this app could solve all problems in the world. Boy was he wrong. Just like the rate of unemployment, funding for public schools, and human rights in this country, the app kept CRASHING!! SO SAD! I feel harassed, violated, and lied to. The same emotions that are associated with the man in charge of it!

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: I was on the app just now thought it was going to be good but it didn‚Äôt work because they knew I was Mexican and restricted Mexicans from using. Highly disappointed and hate this app. Hope they just delete it at this point.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app made my house haunted by demons. Last night, one of the demons (I named him fluffy) tried to grab me by my toes and pull me off my bed and down to h*ll. Another demon tried to kill my pet pterodactyl named peaches. I didn‚Äôt appreciate it. Don‚Äôt get this app unless you want demons to haunt your house.

attributes.title: Trash of an App
attributes.review: I swear this app gave my phone a virus. Everything was fine until I downloaded this!! Now my phone won‚Äôt stop glitching and won‚Äôt even let me use half of my apps!! Extremely disappointing. I do not recommend. At. All.
